typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	rowswritten as integer,
	processingtime as integer
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(rowswritten1 = $rowswritten) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rowswritten.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		rowswritten = rowswritten1
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
